title: VisualViewportChange
description: Browser-specific. Schema representing a change to the visual viewport, defined in terms of the web platform VisualViewport API.

items.title: VisualViewportOffsetLeft
items.description: The offset of the left edge of the visual viewport from the left edge of the layout viewport in CSS pixels.

items.title: VisualViewportOffsetTop
items.description: The offset of the top edge of the visual viewport from the top edge of the layout viewport in CSS pixels.

items.title: VisualViewportPageLeft
items.description: The x coordinate of the visual viewport relative to the initial containing block origin of the top edge in CSS pixels.

items.title: VisualViewportPageTop
items.description: The y coordinate of the visual viewport relative to the initial containing block origin of the top edge in CSS pixels.

items.title: VisualViewportWidth
items.description: The width of the visual viewport in CSS pixels.

items.title: VisualViewportHeight
items.description: The height of the visual viewport in CSS pixels.

items.title: VisualViewportScale
items.description: The pinch-zoom scaling factor applied to the visual viewport.
